address: Xã Đông Cứu, Huyện Gia Bình, Tỉnh Bắc Ninh
thought:
**My Analysis of the Administrative Unit Change for "Xã Đông Cứu, Huyện Gia Bình, Tỉnh Bắc Ninh"**

Okay, here's my breakdown of how to handle this query about the administrative change for the address "Xã Đông Cứu, Huyện Gia Bình, Tỉnh Bắc Ninh".  My focus is on pinpointing the new ward name and confirming the highest confidence in this determination.

First, I identified "Tỉnh Bắc Ninh" as the province. Then, I quickly scanned for any provincial mergers. I checked relevant resolutions, particularly "60-NQ/TW," but Bắc Ninh isn't listed for consolidation. Good.

Next, I zeroed in on ward-level changes. I immediately looked for resolutions concerning "Tỉnh Bắc Ninh." I found "1658/NQ-UBTVQH15." Within that resolution, I analyzed relevant lines.

Initially, I noted that line 13 mentioned "thị trấn Gia Bình" and other wards forming "xã Gia Bình," but "Xã Đông Cứu" wasn't mentioned, which wasn't relevant. However, line 17 was *crucial*. It stated that "Giang Sơn," "Lãng Ngâm," and, crucially, "Đông Cứu" would be merged into a *new* ward also named "xã Đông Cứu." Bingo! This is a direct match with the original address.

To confirm my findings and ensure there was no confusion, I searched the list of "New wards" for "xã Đông Cứu" in "Tỉnh Bắc Ninh." I located the entry: `{"ward_code":"09487","ward_name":"Xã Đông Cứu","province_name":"Tỉnh Bắc Ninh"}`. Perfect. I needed the ward code for the output.

Just to be absolutely certain, I did a quick check of other resolutions related to ward changes in other provinces to see if any other "Đông Cứu" existed, but nothing that would cause confusion. I looked at the resolution related to Phú Thọ Province and found "Đông Cửu" (with "ử"), but this was a different place entirely.

This all points to "1658/NQ-UBTVQH15" being the key resolution, and line 17 being the relevant line. The ward name is confirmed as "Xã Đông Cứu", province name is "Tỉnh Bắc Ninh", and the citation will be to the correct resolution and line.  I'm confident enough to assign a "high" confidence level to this match. The ward code from the "New wards" list will be the best one to use to generate the JSON.

citation.header: 1658/NQ-UBTVQH15: Sắp xếp các đơn vị hành chính cấp xã của tỉnh Bắc Ninh
citation.line: 17. Sắp xếp toàn bộ diện tích tự nhiên, quy mô dân số của các xã Giang Sơn, Lãng Ngâm và Đông Cứu thành xã mới có tên gọi là xã Đông Cứu.
